titleStmt.title: A new fairing for the merrily disposed:, or, The comical history of the famous Merry Andrew. W. Phill---. ; Giving an account of his pleasant humours, various adventures, cheats, frolicks, & cunning designs both in city and country.
titleStmt.author: Phillips, William.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by J. Wallis, and sold by most book-sellers,

notesStmt.note: "This may be printed. Aug. 13. 1687. R.P."--Facing t.p.
